summary: During a cryogenics test, a pilot frozen in 1939 awakes in 1992 but time is running out, as his body starts to age rapidly.
cast: Mel Gibson|Jamie Lee Curtis|Elijah Wood|Isabel Glasser|George Wendt|Joe Morton|Nicolas Surovy|David Marshall Grant|Robert Hy Gorman|Millie Slavin|Michael A. Goorjian|Veronica Lauren|Art LaFleur|Eric Pierpoint|Walton Goggins|Amanda Foreman|Karla Tamburrelli|Robert Munns|JD Cullum|Ava Lazar|Richard Ryder|Michael Briggs|Kenneth Ransom|Jared Chandler|Jon Menick|Paul Ganus|Jason Rainwater|Mary Ellen Moore|Miriam Beesley|Lisa Savage|Cody Burger|Dean Hallo|Greg Allan Martin|Joel McKinnon Miller|William Marquez|Steve Hinton Jr.|John Bourg|Ara Maxwell|Terrence Beasor|D.J. Billings|Michael Forte|Jack Kandel|Jason Long|Steve Moriarty|Mike Muscat|Gregory Rae Stone|Christopher Yohe
title: Eternamente joven
